title: Weaver: Foundation Models for Creative Writing
abstract: This work introduces Weaver, our first family of large language models (LLMs) dedicated to content creation. Weaver is pre-trained on a carefully selected corpus that focuses on improving the writing capabilities of large language models. We then fine-tune Weaver for creative and professional writing purposes and align it to the preference of professional writers using a suit of novel methods for instruction data synthesis and LLM alignment, making it able to produce more human-like texts and follow more diverse instructions for content creation. The Weaver family consists of models of Weaver Mini (1.8B), Weaver Base (6B), Weaver Pro (14B), and Weaver Ultra (34B) sizes, suitable for different applications and can be dynamically dispatched by a routing agent according to query complexity to balance response quality and computation cost. translated_title: Weaver: 创意写作的基础模型
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了 Weaver，我们的第一个专注于内容创作的大型语言模型（LLM）系列。Weaver 在一个精选的语料库上进行预训练，专注于提升大型语言模型的写作能力。然后，我们使用一套新颖的方法进行指导数据合成和 LLM 对齐，对 Weaver 进行创意和职业写作的微调，使其能够产生更加人类化的文本并遵循更加多样的内容创作指导。Weaver 系列包括 Weaver Mini（1.8B）、Weaver Base（6B）、Weaver Pro（14B）和 Weaver Ultra（34B）等不同大小的模型，适用于不同的应用，可以根据查询复杂度由路由代理动态分配，从而平衡响应质量和计算成本。在经过精心策划的大型语言模型写作能力评估基准上的评估结果表明，Weaver 的所有模型尺寸胜过了通用型大型语言模型。
tldr: Weaver是一系列专注于创作内容的大型语言模型，通过预训练和微调，以更人类化的方式生成文本和遵循多样的内容创作指导。不同大小的Weaver模型适用于不同的应用，可以动态分配计算资源。评估结果表明，Weaver模型在大型语言模型写作能力上胜过通用型模型。
en_tdlr: Weaver is a series of large language models dedicated to content creation, which can generate texts in a more human-like manner and follow diverse instructions for content creation. Different sizes of Weaver models can be dynamically dispatched to balance response quality and computation cost. Evaluation results show that Weaver models outperform generalist models in writing capabilities.
